name: SessionAttributeBits
desc: The attributes of a security session.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Initializes a session attribute bits structure.

items.name: static var sessionIsRoot: SessionAttributeBits
items.desc: A bit that indicates the session is the root session.

items.name: static var sessionHasGraphicAccess: SessionAttributeBits
items.desc: A bit that indicates a graphic subsystem is available.

items.name: static var sessionHasTTY: SessionAttributeBits
items.desc: A bit that indicates /dev/tty is available.

items.name: static var sessionIsRemote: SessionAttributeBits
items.desc: A bit that indicates the session was initiated over the network.
